# Class TTSFactory

Factory class for creating TTS (Text-to-Speech) instances. Provides methods to create both local and remote speech synthesis models.

##### Index

### Methods

createLocal createRemote

## Methods

### `Static`createLocal

  * createLocal(config: [LocalTTSConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_tts_config.LocalTTSConfigInterface)): Promise<[TTS](./primitives_tts_tts.TTS)>

Creates a local TTS instance.

#### Parameters

    * config: [LocalTTSConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_tts_config.LocalTTSConfigInterface)

Configuration for the local TTS

#### Returns Promise<[TTS](./primitives_tts_tts.TTS)>

Promise resolving to a new TTS instance




### `Static`createRemote

  * createRemote(config: [RemoteTTSConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_tts_config.RemoteTTSConfigInterface)): Promise<[TTS](./primitives_tts_tts.TTS)>

Creates a remote TTS instance.

#### Parameters

    * config: [RemoteTTSConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_tts_config.RemoteTTSConfigInterface)

Configuration for the remote TTS

#### Returns Promise<[TTS](./primitives_tts_tts.TTS)>

Promise resolving to a new TTS instance
